channel.title: COOLmanYT Blog
channel.description: Updates, devlogs, and essays from COOLmanYT.

item.title: Australian Social Media Ban
item.description: I dive deep into why Australia's proposed social media ban for under-16s is such a catastrophic mistake and how it affects everyone.
item.content:encoded: The Australian Government has made a very catastrophic mistake by banning social media for Australians under 16. I break down why the proposal fails, who it harms, and what a better approach could look like.

item.title: Building my Website using GPT-5 Codex (and some brains)
item.description: I created this entire website with a mix of GitHub Copilot, GPT-5 Codex, and my own stubbornness. Here is how the prototypes evolved into the current release candidate.
item.content:encoded: I rewrote the whole combat-inspired site flow with modular tooling, telemetry, and a healthier roadmap for what ships next.
